PDF image rendering in Author mode

context.p: provides experimental support for PDF images using the Apache PDFBox library.
To allow the rendering of PDF images in Author mode, follow this procedure:

step.cmd: Go to and download the pre-built PDFBox standalone binary JAR files: pdfbox-2.0.3.jar, fontbox-2.0.3.jar, and xmpbox-2.0.3.jar. Alternatively, you can use the 1.8.12 version of these files, as they have been tested and work properly.

info.note: It is not recommended to use pdfbox-app-2.0.3.jar file instead of the three specified files because it contains additional classes that may cause conflicts elsewhere in .

step.cmd: Create a subfolder called pdfImageJars in the \lib directory.
Copy the downloaded JAR libraries to that newly created subfolder.
Open OXYGEN_PLUGIN_DIR/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF and add a reference to the JAR libraries in the Bundle-ClassPath entry.

cmd.ph: Restart Eclipse in clean mode (edit the shortcut you use to start Eclipse and add -clean as the first argument.)
